item.description:
You are invited to the Salem pug meetup !

Please come to a pug meet up at:
WagsDoggiedaycare
Iron Rail Building
91 Grapevine Road
Wenham, MA 01984
Phone: 978-468-9924
Email: wagsdoggiedaycare@yahoo.com
Owner: Lisa Kane

meetup organzier: Kristen Slattery
kristen.ss@hotmail.com


9am-11am
cost is $5 per dog - pay at the door (please bring exact change)
RAIN OR SHINE


Lisa Kane, owner of Wags, has graciously allowed us to rent her space. Her facility has plenty of parking and there is no limit to the amount of people who can come to these meetups! The space has indoor and outdoor play areas and both are fully enclosed. All pugs are off lease and safe.



Thanks everyone!

Kristen and 'Maizee the pug'

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: The Salem Pug March Meetup
